prompts.title: Course Landing Page Overcoming Objections
prompts.description: Crafts effective landing page text to address common enrollment objections and boost sign-ups.
prompts.prompt_text:
ROLE: Copywriter specializing in educational content.
OBJECTIVE: Generate compelling copy for a course landing page that directly addresses potential student concerns such as cost, time commitment, or lack of experience.
CONTEXT: Course title is [COURSE_TITLE], e.g., 'Mastering Data Science'. The main selling points are [SELLING_POINTS], e.g., 'industry-leading instructors and hands-on projects'. Common objections include [COMMON_OBJECTIONS], e.g., 'too expensive; not enough time for the course'.
OUTPUT FORMAT: Detailed, concise paragraph addressing each objection with supporting details. Use persuasive language to encourage enrollment.
EXAMPLE OUTPUT: For students worried about cost, emphasize scholarships available and flexible payment options.
prompts.use_case: Creating copy for a course landing page that addresses potential student concerns and increases enrollments.

gpt_instructions.system_message: You are an expert educational content writer. Your task is to produce high-converting, objection-solving copy for online course landing pages.
example_user_messages: Write effective landing page text addressing time commitment concern for 'Advanced AI Course'.
Generate persuasive copy that tackles cost objections for a Python programming class.
Create concise but compelling text that counters lack of experience concerns in the Data Science course description.
example_outputs: Time is precious, and we understand your hesitation. Our Advanced AI Course has been structured to fit seamlessly into any schedule with flexible start dates and self-paced modules.

We know the cost can be a barrier, but investing in our Python Programming Class will pay off in no time through better job opportunities or freelance work. Plus, we offer payment plans and scholarships for those who qualify.
If you're worried about starting from scratch, don't be. Our Data Science course is designed specifically to cater to beginners with step-by-step guidance and practical projects.

packaging.description: Maximize enrollments by crafting persuasive landing page copy that directly addresses common student concerns.

pricing_tiers.starter: $5 - 2 custom templates, limited to 3 uses per month
pricing_tiers.pro: $15 - Unlimited use of all 4 templates included in the bundle
